page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content: ON FRIDAYS I GET UP AT 6.30AM. DRESS AND WASH. I GO DOWNSTAIRS AND LET THE DOGS OUT AND TAKE THEM FOR A WALK TO THE OLD QUARRY. I PLAY ON MY B.M.X. BIKE UNTIL BREAKFAST,AFTER WHICH I PREPARE FOR SCHOOL. MY DAD DRIVES TOM, MY BROTHER AND ME TO WEST TANFIELD SCHOOL. I PLAY WITH FRANCIS AND ALEX IN THE SCHOOL PLAYGROUND UNTIL THE WHISTLE IS BLOWN AT 8.45AM. OUR SCHOOL DAY ALWAYS BEGINS WITH A SCHOOL ASSEMBLY. WE HAVE LESSONS UNTIL 11.45AM. WHEN WE HAVE OUR SCHOOL DINNER. WE BEGIN AFTERNOON SCHOOL AT 12.55PM. AND SCHOOL FINISHES AT 3.25PM. I HURRY HOME FOR TEA THEN MUMMY TAKES ME TO THE PONY CLUB MEETING. SHE DRIVES A LAND ROVER WITH A HORSE BOX BEHIND.
